message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Firm session for mid/small caps. Leadership in pharma (Laurus, Wock, Alkem, Wock), exchanges/depositories (BSE, MCX, CDSL) and select PSU metals (SAIL, HindCopper). Telecom towers constructive (IndusTower). Our portfolio benefited from LAURUSLABS and LTF holding above 300; BSE pulled back into a potential add zone. Key risk: LTF concentration (~44% of portfolio).",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "signal": "Trim/Trail",
      "reason": "Closed above 300 on strong volume but position size is ~44% of portfolio; book partial to de-risk and trail remainder with stop ~291.",
      "price": 300.90
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "signal": "Add on retest or breakout",
      "reason": "Pulled back into 2610–2635 buy zone within a strong exchange/depository theme; alternatively add above 2705 with volume.",
      "price": 2625.30
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Hold / Trail",
      "reason": "Momentum intact with higher close; trail stop ~965; consider add only on strength above 1005.",
      "price": 1001.05
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BHEL",
      "signal": "Add on breakout",
      "reason": "Strong day closing near highs; add on decisive move above 275 with stop ~266.",
      "price": 273.35
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BEL",
      "signal": "Hold / Add on strength",
      "reason": "Range-bound 414–421; add only on a clean push above 420.4 with volume; protect with stop ~404.",
      "price": 416.85
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "signal": "Buy on strength or on dip",
      "reason": "High-volume momentum; trigger above 145.2 for continuation or buy dips to 141–142 with stop ~137.5.",
      "price": 144.34
    },
    {
      "symbol": "CDSL",
      "signal": "Buy on retest",
      "reason": "Breakout toward 1600+ with volume; prefer entries 1550–1575 with stop ~1495; pairs with BSE theme.",
      "price": 1589.80
    },
    {
      "symbol": "INDUSTOWER",
      "signal": "Breakout watch",
      "reason": "Tight range near round number; continuation setup above 404/405 with stop ~392.",
      "price": 398.75
    },
    {
      "symbol": "ABCAPITAL",
      "signal": "Buy on retest",
      "reason": "Reclaimed 335–340 supply; look to buy near 335–338 with stop ~324 for risk-defined swing.",
      "price": 333.55
    },
    {
      "symbol": "ASTRAL",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout or controlled dip",
      "reason": "Strong range expansion; buy >1578 with stop ~1546 or buy dips to 1550–1560 if tape stays firm.",
      "price": 1566.90
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "action": "Sell",
      "reason": "Risk management due to outsized position (~44% of portfolio). Lock partial gains and diversify exposure.",
      "quantity": 10,
      "price": "MKT near 301–305 (use SL-M 291 if weakness at open)"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "action": "Buy",
      "reason": "Rotate small capital into a high-volume momentum candidate if strength confirms; contingent on LTF trim freeing cash.",
      "quantity": 12,
      "price": "Trigger 145.20; limit up to 146.50; initial stop 137.50"
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 472.60,
    "total_value": 27508.35,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ ₹2385.00 (CMP ₹2625.30)",
      "LTF: 40 units @ ₹275.59 (CMP ₹300.90)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ ₹419.45 (CMP ₹416.85)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ ₹900.05 (CMP ₹1001.05)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ ₹265.49 (CMP ₹273.35)",
      "NHPC: 30 units @ ₹81.48 (CMP ₹82.31)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Pharma leadership broadening: LAURUSLABS, WOCKPHARMA, ALKEM, NAVINFLUOR strong—favor buy-the-dip or strength adds; avoid chasing extended candles.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories theme strong: BSE pullback to buy zone; CDSL constructive on retest 1550–1575; MCX extended—prefer dips.",
    "PSU metals momentum: SAIL breakout watch >145.2; HINDCOPPER firm above 333—buy only on dips with stops.",
    "Telecom towers: INDUSTOWER basing—trigger >404/405 could open next leg.",
    "Financials: LTF leadership but trim risk; ABCAPITAL reclaimed 335–340—buy retest with tight stop; AUBANK constructive >914–922 zone.",
    "Capital goods/mid-industrials: BHEL add >275; ABB/CUMMINS steady but not expanding—wait for strength.",
    "IT/ER&D mixed: KPITTECH firm >1209; PERSISTENT/MPHASIS faded—avoid fresh buys until relative strength improves.",
    "Renewables: WAAREEENER soft; NTPCGREEN range-bound—wait for reclaim of 3320/100 respectively.",
    "Real estate/infra: PRESTIGE steady near highs; MAZDOCK/GRSE strong trends—prefer pullbacks rather than chasing.",
    "FMCG/Staples: DABUR/MARICO stable; JUBLFOOD constructive but needs strength >589 for cleaner trigger.",
    "Banks/PSU: UNIONBANK/INDIANB firm; smaller PSBs mixed—focus on relative strength within pack.",
    "Risk controls (reference): LTF 291 trail, BSE 2575 (for any new add), BEL 404, LAURUS 965, BHEL 266, NHPC 79.9.",
    "If Tuesday opens with >0.7% gap, let first 20–30 minutes set ranges; use pullback entries and avoid chasing opening spikes."
  ]
}
